mention.text: RAF Croughton , which is just 20 miles from Prime Minister David Cameron s constituency
a US Air Force base in Northamptonshire
the Pentagon s main military intelligence service
RAF Menwith Hill in North Yorkshire
The Independent , that under no circumstances could bases made available to the US be used operationally without the agreement of Her Majesty s Government
The new spend of $ 317 million on facilities at RAF Croughton
coordinator of the Campaign for the Accountability of American Airbases
